snippet.title: Harness XML with PHP 5 extensions
snippet.description:
Harness XML with PHP 5 extensions
PHP is one of the most commonly used languages for developing web sites while XML has become an industry standard for exchanging data. Increasingly, web sites use XML to transfer data through web feeds such as RSS and Atom, or through web services. PHP 5 XML extensions provide support for parsing, transformation, XPath â€¦
Deepak Vohra, 15 Aug 2008
